sentences.en: a rise in the price of oil
sentences.cn: 石油价格的上涨

sentences.en: an attorney who tried to oil the judge's hand in order to obtain a directed verdict favorable to his client.
sentences.cn: 为使判决导向有利于其委托人的局面而试着向法官行贿的律师

sentences.en: An oil executive swindled £50,000 out of his firm.
sentences.cn: 一名石油公司主管从其公司骗取了5万英镑。

sentences.en: an oil refinery
sentences.cn: 炼油厂

sentences.en: compliments oil the wheels of life.
sentences.cn: 称赞会使生活更好过。

sentences.en: Fire may have breached the cargo tanks and set the oil ablaze.
sentences.cn: 大火当时有可能把货船上的油罐烧漏了，从而引燃原油。

sentences.en: He was acutely aware of the odour of cooking oil.
sentences.cn: 他闻到一股浓浓的油烟味。

sentences.en: He was involved in oil, zinc and lead prospecting.
sentences.cn: 他参与了石油、锌和铅的勘探。

sentences.en: His work clothes, having become saturated with oil, had to be cleaned.
sentences.cn: 他的工作服已经被油浸透，该洗洗了。

sentences.en: Oil majors need not fear being unable to sell their crude.
sentences.cn: 大型石油公司无需担心原油销售不出去。

sentences.en: Oil markets oscillated on the day's reports from Geneva.
sentences.cn: 石油市场因当天来自日内瓦的报道出现了起伏。

sentences.en: oiled the headwaiter's palm.
sentences.cn: 给领班小费

sentences.en: Once its impurities had settled, the oil could be graded.
sentences.cn: 一旦杂质沉淀下去，油就可以分级了。

sentences.en: Petroleum engineers plan and manage the extraction of oil.
sentences.cn: 石油工程师规划并管理石油的提炼。

sentences.en: The bicycle chain needs oiling.
sentences.cn: 自行车链条需要上油了。

sentences.en: The fossil fuels (coal and oil) are finite resources.
sentences.cn: 化石燃料（如煤和石油）属于有限资源。

sentences.en: The Gulf has 65 per cent of the world's oil reserves.
sentences.cn: 海湾地区拥有全世界65％的石油储藏。

sentences.en: the importance of protecting our oil supplies
sentences.cn: 保护我们石油供应的重要性

sentences.en: The oil company jousts with Esso for lead position in UK sales.
sentences.cn: 这家石油公司和埃索公司角逐英国市场销量的榜首位置。

sentences.en: The oil is attacked by naturally occurring microbes which break it down.
sentences.cn: 原油受到了自然产生的分解油类物质的微生物的侵蚀。

sentences.en: Try a hot bath with some relaxing bath oil.
sentences.cn: 用舒缓沐浴油洗个热水澡吧。

sentences.en: Watercolour still seems somehow to be the poor relation of oil painting.
sentences.cn: 水彩画似乎仍比油画略逊一筹。

words.tran_cn: 涂油的；用油防水的；喝醉的
油的；油质的；油滑的；油腔滑调的
光滑地；油似地；马屁十足地；圆滑地
润滑剂,润滑脂,脂肪,油类,药膏

phrases.tran_cn: 重油（将焦油蒸馏得到的比重大于水）

phrases.phrase: oil (someone's) hand 或 oil (someone's) palm 【非正式用语】

phrases.tran_cn: 油和水（指互不相容的因素或人）

trans.tran_en: the thick dark liquid from under the ground from which petrol is produced
to put oil onto part of a machine or part of something that moves, to help it to move or work more smoothly
